original_text: Joseph said to his brothers, ‘I am Joseph! Is my father still alive?’ But his brothers could not answer him because they were too frightened. They could see Joseph was there in front of them!
korean_text: 요셉이 그 형들에게 이르되 나는 요셉이라 내 아버지께서 아직 살아 계시니이까 형들이 그 앞에서 놀라서 대답하지 못하더라

sentences.original_text: But his brothers could not answer him
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 그의 형제들은 그에게 대답할 수 없었다

sentences.original_text: They could see Joseph was there
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 요셉이 거기에 있는 것을 볼 수 있었다

sentences.original_text: Joseph was there in front of them!
